plugin_store_gantt_chart_asset_gantt_cha:
Visualize and manage project timelines, dependencies, and progress with interactive Gantt charts in JustDo.
Plan, track, and deliver projects efficiently while ensuring on-time delivery.
plugin_store_gantt_chart_asset_milestone:
Mark significant events and deadlines within your project timeline using Milestones.
Provide clear visual checkpoints to keep your team focused, motivated, and aligned.
plugin_store_gantt_chart_asset_key_tasks:
Identify and highlight crucial tasks or milestones that significantly impact project progress and success.
Ensure these critical activities are prioritized and tracked effectively.
plugin_store_gantt_chart_asset_baselines:
Track project progress and identify deviations from the original plan using Baselines.
Compare different versions of your project schedule to ensure on-time delivery and project success.
plugin_store_gantt_chart_asset_slack_tim:
Visualize task flexibility and potential schedule buffers directly on your Gantt chart.
Proactively manage risks and ensure on-time project delivery with JustDo.
plugin_store_gantt_chart_asset_buffers_s: Add buffer tasks to your project schedule to accommodate uncertainties, manage risks, and prevent delays from impacting the overall project timeline.
